hadiths.text: In the hadith transmitted by Yahya b. Sa'id on the authority of Qatada (the words are):(The believing servant) finds relief from the troubles of the world and its hardships and (gets into) the Mercy of Allah

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي " مُسْتَرِيحٌ وَمُسْتَرَاحٌ مِنْهُ "
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning one who finds relief and one from whom relief is found
